title: XML.com
description: XML.com features a rich mix of information and services for the XML community.

items.title: Processing Inclusions with XSLT
items.description: Processing document inclusions with general XML tools can be problematic. This article proposes a way of preserving inclusion information through SAX-based processing.

items.title: Putting RDF to Work
items.description: Tool and API support for the Resource Description Framework is slowly coming of age. Edd Dumbill takes a look at RDFDB, one of the most exciting new RDF toolkits.
